Text: Thank you so much! Great quality!

Thank you! I have been trying to get my hands on WMF to no avail since I live in Singapore, and as far as I know, it's not released here yet. For now, at least I will have the electronic version to satisfy my thirst XD XD XD Hurray~!

@Aurioca you could have bought it online, this book and its 1st(THE NAME OF THE WIND) part have not been released in my country too but i bought it first part  online as i don't  like reading on my PC. I like real books not electronic.

Thank you. I really liked the first part. Books on print are great, having to carry a lot of things with you not so much, therefore ebooks are excellent to carry with you and read on the commute. Very kind of you to upload it.
